医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
常见的胃细菌可能与阿尔茨海默病的较高风险有关新的研究表明，世界三分之二的人口中发现的一种常见胃细菌可能与阿尔茨海默病的较高风险有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231226/Common-stomach-bacteria-may-be-linked-to-higher-risk-of-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231226/Common-stomach-bacteria-may-be-linked-to-higher-risk-of-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=27399f42-3825-41f5-9241-51df91b50fbd Tue, 26 Dec 2023 00:51:30 -0500 Common stomach bacteria may be linked to higher risk of Alzheimer's disease
麻省理工学院的工程师开发出“震动腹部”药丸来控制食欲和抑制肥胖当你吃一顿大餐时，你的胃会向你的大脑发送信号，产生饱腹感，这有助于你意识到是时候停止进食了。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231226/MIT-engineers-develop-vibing-belly-pill-to-control-appetite-and-curb-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231226/MIT-engineers-develop-vibing-belly-pill-to-control-appetite-and-curb-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8e4d3413-9b35-4c66-b04b-b54a6753875a Tue, 26 Dec 2023 00:39:28 -0500 MIT engineers develop 'vibing belly' pill to control appetite and curb obesity
对宠物疫苗接种的态度可能与人类疫苗接种犹豫不决有关德克萨斯农工大学公共卫生学院最近在《疫苗》杂志上发表的一项新研究的主题是对宠物疫苗接种的态度以及它们与人类疫苗犹豫之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231225/Attitudes-toward-pet-vaccination-may-be-linked-with- human-vaccine-hesitancy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231225/Attitudes-toward-pet-vaccination-may-be-linked-with- human-vaccine-hesitancy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c93dabb2-73e1-47d2-8b6b-46b6ff0eb1b1 Mon, 25 Dec 2023 23:46:31 -0500 Attitudes toward pet vaccination may be linked with human vaccine hesitancy
加州大学旧金山分校任命著名外科医生和研究员 Benjamin Ma 博士为骨科外科主任Benjamin Ma 医学博士是一位备受推崇的整形外科医生和高级影像研究员，被任命为 UCSF 整形外科系主任。马云将于 2024 年 1 月 1 日就任新职务。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231225/UCSF-appoints-renowned-surgeon-and-researcher-Dr-Benjamin-Ma-as-chair-of-orthopedic-surgery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231225/UCSF-appoints-renowned-surgeon-and-researcher-Dr-Benjamin-Ma-as-chair-of-orthopedic-surgery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=826745cb-aa21-482b-b895-2d85e6ddafac Mon, 25 Dec 2023 23:19:02 -0500 UCSF appoints renowned surgeon and researcher Dr. Benjamin Ma as chair of orthopedic surgery
2005-2021 年腹部整形术趋势：门诊手术、吸脂术和肝素使用增加根据美国官方医学杂志《整形与重建外科》1 月号的一项新的 16 年分析，腹部整形术仍然是一种安全有效的手术，更多的病例在门诊进行，同时抽脂术的使用也有所增加。整形外科医生协会 (ASPS)。该期刊由威科集团 (Wolters Kluwer) 的 Lippincott 作品集出版。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231225/Abdominoplasty-trends-2005-2021-Increased-out Patient-procedures-liposuction-and-heparin-use.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231225/Abdominoplasty-trends-2005-2021-Increased-out Patient-procedures-liposuction-and-heparin-use.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cc6d64ed-6b4c-42bf-b80b-f15f70e632e8 Mon, 25 Dec 2023 21:52:34 -0500 Abdominoplasty trends 2005-2021: Increased outpatient procedures, liposuction, and heparin use

研究确定了两种驱动水母触手生长的干细胞类型水母 Cladonema 的大小约为小指指甲大小，可以在两到三天内再生出截断的触手；但如何呢？包括蝾螈和昆虫在内的各种物种的功能组织再生依赖于形成芽基的能力，芽基是一团未分化的细胞，可以修复损伤并长成缺失的附属物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231225/Study-identizes-two-stem-cell-types-driven-jellyfish-tentacle-growth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231225/Study-identizes-two-stem-cell-types-driven-jellyfish-tentacle-growth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e27fc03f-6850-4315-b0e9-545a12bc66a3 Mon, 25 Dec 2023 21:30:16 -0500 Study identifies two stem cell types driving jellyfish tentacle growth
简单的邮件技巧使高危患者的肝癌筛查率翻倍宾夕法尼亚大学佩雷​​尔曼医学院的一项新研究显示，当肝硬化患者收到专家签署的命令后，他们的肝癌筛查几乎增加了一倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231222/Simple-mail-trick-doubles-liver-cancer-screening-rates-for-high-risk-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231222/Simple-mail-trick-doubles-liver-cancer-screening-rates-for-high-risk-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0d288c65-c4ce-423b-87bd-3f0b21dd0f9c Fri, 22 Dec 2023 12:41:00 -0500 Simple mail trick doubles liver cancer screening rates for high-risk patients
柑橘补充剂可以缓解手术后膝盖肿胀和疼痛《骨与关节杂志》上的一项临床试验报告称，对于接受全膝关节置换术 (TKA) 的患者，使用地奥司明（一种从柑橘类水果中提取的类黄酮补充剂）治疗可以减轻膝盖和腿部的肿胀，并减轻相关疼痛。外科手术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231222/Citrus-supplement-may-ease-knee-swelling-and-pain-after-surgery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231222/Citrus-supplement-may-ease-knee-swelling-and-pain-after-surgery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=82efb1da-6139-428e-befc-edf934fc8cae Fri, 22 Dec 2023 12:25:00 -0500 Citrus supplement may ease knee swelling and pain after surgery
